overview: Does it get any better than watching real life lesbian couples fuck on screen? Throw in a couple of real, natural redheads and you have a mix of stunning eroticism that's difficult to match. This is every girl's dream. Enjoy over two hours of passionate love stories as these young future brides decide to get a little girl on girl on before the wedding. They leave no inch of their beautiful bodies untouched as the lick, finger and caress each other, there's even some strap on action in the final scene!
title: Lesbian Bridal Stories 3
